🎓 M.S. in **Business Analytics (STEM)** at the **University of Southern California, Marshall School of Business**

📊 **Skills**: Strategic Planning & Execution, Structured Problem Solving, Data Analysis, Data Modeling, Predictive Modeling, Forecasting, Statistical Analysis, Machine Learning, Market Research, Competitive Analysis, Insight Communication, Data Storytelling, Cross-Functional Collaboration, Stakeholder Engagement

💼 **Tools**: SQL, Python, Excel, Google Sheets, Tabelau, Power BI, Looker, Google Analytics, PowerPoint, Google Slides

🔥 At the heart of what I do is a **genuine curiosity—I’m always asking “Why?”** This curiosity drives me to understand problems deeply, explore different perspectives, and come up with practical, creative solutions. 

👯 I genuinely **enjoy working with people from all walks of life—it’s how I learn, grow, and do my best work.** Some of the most rewarding moments have come from teaming up with talented people to drive the best outcomes.

🧘️ Outside of work, I enjoy exploring nature, playing tennis, practicing hot yoga, cooking, making music, and offering life advice to friends!
